products.name: 01. La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavor.

products.name: 02. El Tigre
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with little bit of peanuts with caramel.

products.name: 03. La Cucaracha
products.description: Sweet and intense with big amount of different flavors. Caramel, grapes strawberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days.
